actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the age and service requirements for immediate retirement under subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Revises the age and service requirements for immediate retirement from the civil service so as to permit such retirement of Federal employees or Members of Congress separated from the Service with an age plus service aggregate of at least 80 years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the age and service requirements for immediate retirement under subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code.
